summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 2.9°C), and feels like temperature (down 1.8°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 332m to 1648m and averaged 1290.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; sweltering, especially in sunny spots. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and a light breeze will be noticeable. Chance of light rain, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
